posts.postText:
1) Which server: Trouble in Terrorist Town
2) Offender's name: CuttingEdge
3) Offender's SteamID: STEAM_0:0:45551274
4) Explain the situation in detail: He was walking a bit faster than normal, usually when traversing stairs.
5) Were any specific server rules broken: Rule 2
6) Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence: My good man Chopper
7) Proof:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TJxTyYKnsLo
I saw the video, he was speedhacking. I happened to be alive while he was so I couldn't watch him. Locked and banned anyway.
